item.title: Don't let me be misunderstood. Exploring early speech perception
item.description: May 2019. Massimiliano Canzi. Don’t let me be misunderstood: Exploring early phonological and lexical processing in speech perception. Talk presented at Manchester Forum in Linguistics (mFiL) 2019. The University of Manchester March 2019. Massimiliano Canzi. Understanding phonological and lexical mismatch in auditory perception. Invited talk presented at the Phonetics Laboratory of the University of Glasgow. Introduction to the study. Evidence from event-related potentials (ERP) indicates that phonological and semantic incongruities in online language processing and perception are solved at diff􏰀erent times in the brain (D’Arcy et al.
